did.head: Collection Summary
did.abstract: The scrapbooks contain cartoons from the German press relating to World War I and the German Revolution of 1918-1919, as well as a personal scrapbook of photographs, souvenirs, and miscellanea.

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to audiovisual materials requires at least two weeks advance notice. Audiovisual materials include sound recordings, video recordings, and motion picture film. Hoover staff will determine whether use copies of the materials requested can be made available. Some materials may not be accessible even with advance notice. Please contact the Hoover Institution Archives for further information.

userestrict.head: Publication Rights
userestrict.p: For copyright status, please contact the Hoover Institution Archives.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], Philip M. Powers collection, [Box number], Hoover Institution Archives.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Acquired by the Hoover Institution Archives.

accruals.head: Accruals
accruals.p: Materials may have been added to the collection since this finding aid was prepared. To determine if this has occurred, find the collection in Stanford University's online catalog Socrates at http://library.stanford.edu/webcat. Materials have been added to the collection if the number of boxes listed in Socrates is larger than the number of boxes listed in this finding aid.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content of Collection
scopecontent.p: The scrapbooks contain cartoons from the German press relating to World War I and the German Revolution of 1918-1919, as well as a personal scrapbook of photographs, souvenirs, and miscellanea.

controlaccess.head: Indexing Terms
controlaccess.p: The following terms have been used to index the description of this collection in the library's online public access catalog.
controlaccess.subject: World War, 1914-1918--Germany.

did.unittitle: Scrapbooks of cartoon clippings from the German press in color and black and white,
Cartoons feature Woodrow Wilson, Horatio Herbert Kitchener, Monroe, and John Bull, as well as locations including Japan, England, Italy, and Austria, 98 pages

Cartoons feature Woodrow Wilson, J.P. Morgan, Rockefeller, and Uncle Sam, as well as subjects including New York City, Anglo-American relations, Native Americans, India, Egypt, the Eastern Mediterranean, and the S.M.S. Emden, 100 pages
Cartoons feature Woodrow Wilson, as well as subjects including Italy, Russia, and U.S. munitions sales, 94 pages
Cartoons feature John Bull and Horatio Herbert Kitchener, as well as locations including Serbia, Egypt, Italy, Gallipoli, London, and Turkey, 95 pages
Newspaper clippings, cartoons, small maps, stamps, business cards and correspondence, 104 pages
Cartoons feature Japan, England, Belgium, Russia, and the Philippines, 130 pages
Cartoons feature Theodore Roosevelt and John Bull, as well as subjects including Corfu, Portugal, U-boats, Air warfare, Native Americans, 120 pages

scopecontent.p: Includes souvenirs and greeting cards as well as photographs of bomb damage, newspaper clippings, telegraph messages, cartoon clippings, and Associated Press bulletins from 1918, 1919, and 1920, about 60 pages
